text: Count Dracula () is a 1970 Spanish West German Italian British horror movie directed by Jesús Franco and is based on the 1897 novel Dracula by Bram Stoker. It stars Christopher Lee, Herbert Lom, Klaus Kinski, Fred Williams, Maria Rohm and Soledad Miranda and was distributed by Gloria Film. == Other websites == * * * Category:1970 drama movies Category:1970s horror movies Category:Spanish horror movies Category:German horror movies Category:Italian horror movies Category:Movies about old age Category:British horror movies Category:Dracula movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Jesús Franco Category:Movies set in Barcelona Category:1970s English-language movies Category:1970s British drama movies Category:Spanish drama movies Category:Italian drama movies Category:German drama movies Category:Vampires in movies
title: Count Dracula (movie)
